title: Client is saying I left at champion select and blocking me for 15 min
body: While in champion select for Legend of the Poro King, at the last second someone dodges (or the client glitches and boots me). But afterwards it says that I have left and can't play for 15 minutes. This has happened twice now, yesterday and today. I'm not sure if it's a problem with my client, the game type, or a bug when someone else dodges but I hope someone at rito can help.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm if you ended up with an LPQ from that champ select closing your network might have had some sort of hiccup that made you lose connection with that lobby. First things first, make sure you go through this short checklist of troubleshooting steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you cover the most common reasons for dc's. 

If nothing in that guide helps immediately or an ethernet cable isn't working, make sure you reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can look through your game and network logs for errors.
